title: 5-Minute Deep Breathing
description: Practice box breathing to reduce stress and improve focus during study sessions.
assistant_message: Time for a quick mental reset! I've prepared a 5-minute breathing exercise to help you refocus for your next study block.

personalization.for_visual_learners: Follow the breathing animation and visual timer on screen
personalization.for_stressed_students: This will help calm your mind and reduce study anxiety
personalization.for_tired_students: Deep breathing will re-energize you for better concentration

integration_with_study: Perfect for your 5-minute break before tackling that ECG interpretation material.
success_tracking: Students report 80% better focus after breathing exercises

title: Desk Stretches
description: Simple stretches to relieve neck, shoulder, and back tension from studying.
assistant_message: I notice you've been studying for 25 minutes. Let's do some quick stretches to keep your body comfortable!

personalization.for_physical_learners: Movement helps activate your learning and memory processes
personalization.for_long_sessions: Essential for maintaining good posture during extended study
personalization.for_tension_relief: Targets the most common study-related muscle tension areas

integration_with_study: Stretching now will help you stay comfortable during your next 25-minute study block.

title: Pomodoro Check-in
description: Quick reflection on your study session progress and focus level.
assistant_message: Great job completing that study block! Let's quickly assess how it went and adjust if needed.

personalization.for_achievement_focused: Track your progress milestones and celebrate wins
personalization.for_process_focused: Reflect on learning quality and comprehension
personalization.for_improvement_focused: Identify what's working and what needs adjustment

integration_with_study: This helps me recommend better resources for your next session based on how this one went.

title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Systematically tense and relax muscle groups to reduce physical stress and mental tension.
assistant_message: I can see you're feeling overwhelmed with this challenging material. Let's take 10 minutes for deep relaxation.

personalization.for_high_stress: Especially effective when tackling difficult subjects like neuroanatomy
personalization.for_physical_tension: Addresses both mental and physical study stress
personalization.for_longer_breaks: Perfect for your extended 15-minute break periods

integration_with_study: After this relaxation, you'll return to studying with a clearer, calmer mind.
success_tracking: Reduces study anxiety by 65% and improves retention

title: Hydration & Nutrition Check
description: Reminder to drink water and have a healthy snack to maintain cognitive function.
assistant_message: Your brain needs fuel! Let's make sure you're properly hydrated and nourished for optimal learning.

personalization.for_long_sessions: Critical for maintaining focus during extended study periods
personalization.for_cognitive_function: Proper hydration improves memory and concentration by 25%

integration_with_study: Good nutrition now will help you better absorb that pharmacology material coming up.
success_tracking: Proper hydration improves test performance by 20%

title: Active Recall Practice
description: Quick self-test on the material you just studied without looking at notes.
assistant_message: Time to test what you've learned! This active recall will strengthen your memory of the cardiac anatomy concepts.

personalization.for_visual_learners: Try drawing or visualizing the concepts you just studied
personalization.for_achievement_focused: Challenge yourself to recall key points accurately
personalization.for_retention_improvement: Active recall is proven to improve long-term memory

integration_with_study: Based on how this goes, I'll know whether to recommend review or move to new material.
success_tracking: Active recall improves retention by 50% compared to passive review

title: Eye Rest Exercise (20-20-20 Rule)
description: Look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds to reduce eye strain from screen time.
assistant_message: I notice you've been looking at screens intensively. Let's give your eyes a much-needed break!

personalization.for_screen_heavy_study: Essential when studying from digital resources
personalization.for_eye_strain_prevention: Prevents headaches and maintains visual focus
personalization.for_digital_learners: Balances technology use with eye health

integration_with_study: Rested eyes will help you better focus on those detailed anatomical diagrams.
success_tracking: Reduces eye strain and study headaches by 80%

title: Gratitude & Motivation Moment
description: Reflect on your learning progress and motivations for studying healthcare.
assistant_message: Let's take a moment to appreciate your hard work and reconnect with why you're pursuing healthcare education.

personalization.for_motivation_boost: Especially helpful when studying feels overwhelming
personalization.for_purpose_connection: Reminds you of the bigger picture beyond test scores
personalization.for_positive_mindset: Builds resilience for challenging study sessions

integration_with_study: Renewed motivation will energize your approach to the next study block.
success_tracking: Increases study motivation and persistence by 60%

title: Environment Optimization
description: Quick assessment and adjustment of lighting, temperature, and distractions in your study space.
assistant_message: Let's optimize your study environment for maximum focus and comfort during your next session.

personalization.for_focus_improvement: Small environmental changes can boost concentration significantly
personalization.for_productivity: Eliminates distractions that interrupt flow state

integration_with_study: A better study environment will help you tackle those challenging neurology concepts more effectively.
success_tracking: Optimized environment improves focus and retention by 35%

title: Energizing Movement Break
description: Light physical activity to boost circulation, energy, and mental clarity.
assistant_message: Time for some movement! This will boost your energy and help information process better in your brain.

personalization.for_kinesthetic_learners: Movement enhances your learning and memory formation
personalization.for_energy_boost: Physical activity increases alertness and cognitive function
personalization.for_longer_breaks: Perfect for your 15-minute extended break periods

integration_with_study: Increased circulation will help you stay alert during your upcoming pharmacology study session.
success_tracking: Movement breaks improve cognitive performance by 45%
